data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Edwards, Shelley, Branch, William R., Vanhooydonck, Bieke, Herrel, Anthony, Measey, G. John, Tolley, Krystal A. (2013): Taxonomic adjustments in the systematics of the southern African lacertid lizards (Sauria: Lacertidae). Zootaxa 3669 (2): 101-114, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3669.2.1
